name: Sonic Slamabarrier Showdown
text: If you activate this card: place Sonic Counters on this card up to the number of non-Effect monsters in your GY and that is banished. If a "Sonic" card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can remove 1 Sonic Counter from this card instead. Once per turn: You can remove 1 Sonic Counter from this card and target 1 "Sonic" monster you control; Any battle damage that monster inflicts is doubled.
